dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3495 IH: To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to make improvements to the food safety education program carried out under such Act, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cárdenas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to make improvements to the food safety education program carried out under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 10105 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 7655) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by inserting , including farm workers after industry;
in paragraph (1), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: practices that prevent bacterial contamination of food, how to identify sources of food contamination, and other means of decreasing food contamination.
in subsection (c), by striking 2012 and inserting 2018.
